entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
